title: Races
description: Manage the races, beasts and species that inhabit your world

empty_state.title: No races created
empty_state.description: Start by creating your first race to populate your world

detritivore.label: Detritivore
detritivore.description: Feeds on non-living matter and detritus

chaotic.label: Chaotic
chaotic.description: This race typically has chaotic members who follow their own desires

neutral.label: Neutral
neutral.description: This race is typically balanced in its actions, being neither good nor evil necessarily

honorable.label: Honorable
honorable.description: This race typically has members who follow codes of honor and moral principles

extreme_chaotic.label: Extreme Chaotic
extreme_chaotic.description: This race only has chaotic individuals who follow their own desires

extreme_honorable.label: Extreme Honorable
extreme_honorable.description: This race only has individuals who rigidly follow codes of honor

extreme_neutral.label: Extreme Neutral
extreme_neutral.description: This race has individuals with extremely opposed morals, ranging from absolute chaotic to inflexible honorable

powerless.label: Powerless
powerless.description: An average member would be easily defeated by a common human

weaker.label: Weaker
weaker.description: An average member is weaker than a common human

comparable.label: Comparable
comparable.description: An average member has strength similar to a common human

stronger.label: Stronger
stronger.description: An average member is stronger than a common human

invincible.label: Invincible
invincible.description: An average member could easily eliminate a common human

sexual.label: Sexual
sexual.description: Reproduction that requires two individuals of different sexes to generate offspring

asexual.label: Asexual
asexual.description: Reproduction by cell division or budding, without need for a partner

hermaphrodite.label: Hermaphrodite
hermaphrodite.description: Individuals possess reproductive organs of both sexes, being able to self-fertilize or cross-breed

parthenogenic.label: Parthenogenic
parthenogenic.description: Development of an embryo without fertilization by a male, generating genetic clones

viviparous.label: Viviparous
viviparous.description: Offspring develop inside the parent's body and are born fully formed

other.label: Other
other.description: Custom or unique reproductive cycle of this race

prey.description: This race is prey to the other

parasitism.description: This race benefits by harming the other

commensalism.description: This race benefits without affecting the other
